name: Foodies
summary:
Unleash the power dwelling between your thumbs and help Snacky Sam to win the love of his life.
Miss Pam is a demanding lady. She’s not impressed by fit pretty-boys sticking to a diet. Her chosen one has to have some love handles to fondle. Snacky Sam’s got a week left to gain weight that would satisfy his beloved woman.
“Foodies” equals fistful of fun you won’t be able to experience on any other platform. It has been originally designed for iPhone, using the full power of multi-touch, Retina Display and Game Center.
You simply can’t get bored with 80 different levels full of challenges and entertainment. No matter how good you are, there will always be space to improve your results. Total Game Center score will let you calculate your chances in winning Pam’s heart, and compare them to other players all around world.
